alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:09AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Benton, central Rogers, southern Delaware, southeastern Osage, northeastern Creek, Mayes, northern Adair, Wagoner, northern Cherokee and Tulsa Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 509 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Walnut Creek State Park to near Chouteau to Chloeta. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Sand Springs... Claremore... Tahlequah... Siloam Springs... Wagoner... Jay... Pryor... Owasso... Bixby... Jenks... Glenpool... Coweta... Pryor Creek... Skiatook... Catoosa... Collinsville... Verdigris... Gentry... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 213 and 265. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
